taskbody.prereq:
Ingredients.
4-6 Pieces of Day Old Bread (sucks up the juices better)
¾ Cups Coconut Milk (1/2 a can)
1 Large Banana
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
½ teaspoon Cinnamon
1 Tablespoon Maple Syrup (plus more for serving)
Vegan Butter, Canola Oil, or Coconut Oil for frying

step.cmd: In a food processor or blender, add your coconut milk (shake can before opening), banana, vanilla, a bit of maple syrup, and cinnamon.
Pulse, and whizz that up until you have a thin smoothie like consistency. If it is too watery, add more banana and blend again.

Heat up your pan to about medium and add a pat of butter. Pour your French Toast dip into a shallow bowl that will fit your slices of bread. When pan looks ready, dip your bread in and coat both sides.
Fry the bread up just like you would any French Toast.
Sometimes the sauce ventures around the pan and burns, just scrape it out and add a new pat of butter between batches.
